WorkItem.ClosedComment: This issue has reached the 90 day marker without responses.If this is still an issue please resubmit with the Character file in question and related Version where the issue is still present.
WorkItem.Description:
I recently downloaded .2.2.4 and tried to open my character files. Rawr claims that they are saved with an old incompatible version of rawr.
Normally this can be bypassed if you open the file in the older version you used before, but even 2.2.3 gives the same warning.
Â 
I didnt hit "save" in either version on this file, so im puzzled.
Why doesnt rawr want to load these files?
And how can i make rawr do so without recalculating the whole thing ? ;)
WorkItem.Summary: broken xml-files . open file fails in 2.2-3---> 2.2.4

Comments.Message: You are probably better off recreating the character document (load from armory and then recheck everything that your character has). Sometimes these things happen.
